text: gajin yeoglyangkkeos geudaedeul-i geojuhago issneun gos-eseo geunyeodeul-i meomulge hala. geunyeodeul-eul haechim-eulosseo geunyeodeul-ege abbag-eul gahaji malla. man-yag geunyeodeul-i imsinhan yeoseong-ilamyeon chulsanhal ttaekkaji geunyeodeul-eul buyanghala. geulihayeo geunyeodeul-i geudaedeul-eul wihae jeoj-eul mullyeossdamyeon geudaedeul-eun geunyeodeul-ege bosang-eul judoe geudaedeul gan-e habdanghan bangsig-eulo seolo hyeob-uihala. man-yag geudaedeul saie machal-i issdamyeon geuleul wihae daleun yeoseong-i jeoj-eul mullil geos-ila
